author: Kosaka, Zhou, & Li
notes: Source: Ryūichi Kosaka, Guoyan Zhou, Jinfang Li. 仡央语言词汇集/Geyang yu yan ci hui ji (A Wordlist of Ge-Yang Languages). 贵阳市/Guiyang, China: 贵州民族出版社/Guizhou min zu chu ban she, 1998.This dialect of Buyang is spoken in Ecun (峨村), Wenshan (文山), Yunnan, China. Speakers' autonym is ʑa:ŋ32.
